summary: Recolored the root portion of the vanilla dungeon overgrowth texture. Bumped the texture up to 2048x2048 and generated a new normalmap to enhance detail.
descriptionHtml: This is a recolored replacer for the roots we see in most of the Skyrim dungeons. The vanilla ones looked like a cross between day-old spaghetti and bamboo so I thought retexturing them would remove some of the beige in the dungeons. I also bumped the texture up to 2048x2048 and generated a new normalmap to enhance detail. Enjoy!
author: Aenigmo1
